items.title: GPD Win 5 handheld soars with AMD's Strix Halo â€” gaming deck is almost twice as fast as Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 competitors at same power
items.summary: More content creators have benchmarked GPD's bleeding-edge Win 5 handheld sporting AMD's flagship Strix Halo APU. The high-end SoC produces twice the frame rate of Ryzen AI 9 HX 370-powered handhelds, even at the same power levels.

items.title: GoPro Max2 360 camera debuts with 8K resolution and replaceable lenses
items.summary: GoPro has finally unveiled a successor to the Max 360 action camera called the Max2 360. The company also debuted a new Lit Hero compact action camera and the Fluid Pro AI multi-camera gimbal. The new GoPro Max2 360 camera features a 1/2.3-inch sensor and can shoot 360 videos in up to 8K resolutionâ€¦

items.title: How to win an away Ryder Cup, by European legends

items.title: Barcelona's Gavi out for up to five months
items.summary: Spain midfielder Gavi is expected to miss four to five months after surgery on a knee injury suffered in training.

items.title: Kimmel returns to television to mock FCC Chair Brendan Carr

The comedian tackled the uproar head-on, directly naming Brendan Carr, the Federal Communicaâ€¦

items.title: Celtic set for daunting trip to storied Red Star in Europa opener
items.summary: Like Celtic, Red Star are a club desperate to shine brightly on the continental stage once more, writes BBC Scotland commentator Liam McLeod.

items.title: Will Trafford be questioning decision to return to Man City?
items.summary: James Trafford sealed a dream return to Manchester City in the summer, but will the English goalkeeper now be questioning his decision after the arrival of Gianluigi Donnarumma?

items.title: Lamine Yamal - the eve of a new football era
items.summary: Barcelona teenager Lamine Yamal missed out on becoming the youngest Ballon d'Or winner, but he is destined to create a new footballing era, writes Guillem Balague.

items.title: How Europe won the last Ryder Cup in 2023
items.summary: Watch some of the key moments as Rory McIlroy, Jon Rahm, Tyrrell Hatton, Viktor Hovland, Robert MacIntyre, Shane Lowry and Tommy Fleetwood secure the points to help Europe regain the Ryder Cup in 2023.

items.title: BBC pundits pick their starting XV for World Cup final
items.summary: BBC Sport pundits choose their starting XV as England prepare to face Canada in the Rugby World Cup final at Twickenham on Saturday.

items.title: Chasing greatness through grief - England's warrior queen
items.summary: Megan Jones has carried the weight of devastating personal grief all the way to the Rugby World Cup final.

items.title: WhatsApp announces Message Translations feature for Android and iPhone users
items.summary: WhatsApp has announced a new feature called Message Translations, which, as evident from its name, allows users to translate text messages in chats. The Message Translations feature works with 1:1 conversations, group chats, and Channels. When you see a message in a different language, you can longâ€¦

items.summary: The iPhone 17 Pro in Cosmic Orange. Appleâ€™s new, anodized aluminum iPhone 17 Pro phones have drawn attention for reportedly being easy to scratch around the camera â€œplateau,â€ and iFixit has investigated the issue in microscopic detail in its teardown video for the phones. items.title: How George grabbed lifeline in Chelsea's problem position
items.summary: Chelsea attacker Tyrique George snatches an all-important equaliser at Lincoln City - and it feels like he is grabbing an unlikely lifeline at his boyhood club.

items.title: Are Aberdeen at 'rock bottom' or can it get worse?
items.summary: Manager Jimmy Thelin says Aberdeen have hit "rock bottom" after an insipid defeat by Dundee United left them adrift in the Scottish Premiership.
